name: Ravnica at War

Flying
{7}{U}: Adapt 4. This ability costs {1} less to activate for each instant and sorcery card in your graveyard. (If this creature has no +1/+1 counters on it, put four +1/+1 counters on it.)

rulesText: When Keldon Raider enters the battlefield, you may discard a card. If you do, draw a card.

name: Savai Triome
rulesText:
({T}: Add {R}, {W}, or {B}.)
Savai Triome enters the battlefield tapped.

Whenever another green creature enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on Yorvo. Then if that creature's power is greater than Yorvo's power, put another +1/+1 counter on Yorvo.

rulesText: Tap all creatures your opponents control. Creatures you control gain lifelink until end of turn.

name: Maraleaf Pixie
rulesText:
Flying
{T}: Add {G} or {U}.

rulesText: Counter target creature or enchantment spell. If that spell is countered this way, exile it instead of putting it into its owner's graveyard.

"A great wave crashed, and a mighty wind blew out the stars."
—*The Cosmogony*

At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 1 life and amass 1. (Put a +1/+1 counter on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)
Whenever a Zombie token you control with power 6 or greater attacks, it gains lifelink until end of turn.

Draw two cards.

rulesText: {1}, {T}, Sacrifice another creature: You gain life equal to that creature's toughness. Draw a card.

Draw a card.

Enchant creature

Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)

Flying

Flying

Vigilance
{T}, Sacrifice Bounty Agent: Destroy target legendary permanent that's an artifact, creature, or enchantment.

rulesText: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. That creature gains first strike until end of turn. You gain 2 life.
flavorText: "Welcome to the Legion. You saved a district—now let's go save the world."

name: Savage Gorger
rulesText:
Flying
At the beginning of your end step, if an opponent lost life this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Savage Gorger. (Damage causes loss of life.)
flavorText: "I have no patience for sipping blood from crystal goblets. I want to bite and tear."

name: Biogenic Upgrade
rulesText: Distribute three +1/+1 counters among one, two, or three target creatures, then double the number of +1/+1 counters on each of those creatures.
flavorText:
"To survive exceptional times we must adapt by exceptional means."
—Vannifar

name: Yarok's Wavecrasher
rulesText: When Yarok's Wavecrasher enters the battlefield, return another creature you control to its owner's hand.
flavorText:
"Yarok's waters rush and rage
Where armies bled into the sand."
—*Lament for Bala Ged*, stanza 2

name: Bleeding Edge
rulesText: Up to one target creature gets -2/-2 until end of turn. Amass 2. (Put two +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)

name: Circuitous Route
rulesText: Search your library for up to two basic land cards and/or Gate cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.
flavorText:
"The shortest path between two points is not always the safest."
—Tamina, district guide

name: Mausoleum Secrets
rulesText: Undergrowth — Search your library for a black card with converted mana cost less than or equal to the number of creature cards in your graveyard, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

name: Finale of Eternity
rulesText: Destroy up to three target creatures with toughness X or less. If X is 10 or more, return all creature cards from your graveyard to the battlefield.
flavorText: When you rule by fear, your greatest weakness is one who's no longer afraid.

name: Mogis's Favor
rulesText:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/-1.
Escape—{2}{B}, Exile two other cards from your graveyard. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its escape cost.)
flavorText: Rage-crowned Mogis swiftly rewards the virtue of brutality.

name: Stern Dismissal
rulesText: Return target creature or enchantment an opponent controls to its owner's hand.
flavorText: Cities offer tribute to Ephara and carve her image into their walls, imploring her to protect them from the dangers of the wild.

name: Bone to Ash
rulesText:
Counter target creature spell.
Draw a card.
flavorText:
"I can think of worse ways to go. On second thought, maybe not."
—Ludevic, necro-alchemist

name: Forever Young
rulesText:
Put any number of target creature cards from your graveyard on top of your library.
Draw a card.
flavorText: Those who say you only live once have never been touched by the Cauldron of Eternity.

name: Frogify
rulesText:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature loses all abilities and is a blue Frog creature with base power and toughness 1/1. (It loses all other card types and creature types.)
flavorText: That gnat was still hovering by the venison, and now both looked delicious.

name: Eternal Skylord
rulesText:
When Eternal Skylord enters the battlefield, amass 2. (Put two +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)
Zombie tokens you control have flying.

name: Chance for Glory
rulesText: Creatures you control gain indestructible. Take an extra turn after this one. At the beginning of that turn's end step, you lose the game.
flavorText: "It is not your time. The Legion still needs your blade."

name: Overgrowth Elemental
rulesText:
When Overgrowth Elemental enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on another target Elemental you control.
Whenever another creature you control dies, you gain 1 life. If that creature was an Elemental, put a +1/+1 counter on Overgrowth Elemental.

name: Crashing Drawbridge
rulesText:
Defender
{T}: Creatures you control gain haste until end of turn.
flavorText:
"The Northern Beacon flared, and even before the drawbridge finished its descent, the knights charged out."
—Legend of the Gilded Knights

name: Pharika's Libation
rulesText:
Choose one —
• Target opponent sacrifices a creature.
• Target opponent sacrifices an enchantment.
flavorText: "If you will not pour your drink out for me, I shall pour mine out for you."

name: Unchained Berserker
rulesText:
Protection from white (This creature can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, enchanted, or equipped by anything white.)
Unchained Berserker gets +2/+0 as long as it's attacking.
flavorText: Sathros turned his restraints to revenge.

name: Barge In
rulesText: Target attacking creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Each attacking non-Human creature gains trample until end of turn.
flavorText: The giant had heard of locks, but he had yet to discover a door he couldn't open.

name: Tenth District Legionnaire
rulesText:
Haste
Whenever you cast a spell that targets Tenth District Legionnaire, put a +1/+1 counter on Tenth District Legionnaire, then scry 1.
flavorText:
"The Tenth is under heavy attack, but it's being handled. I sent Mileva."
—Tajic

name: Guildpact Informant
rulesText:
Flying
Whenever Guildpact Informant deals combat damage to a player or planeswalker, proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)
flavorText: "Of course you're being followed!"

name: Frilled Sandwalla
rulesText: {1}{G}: Frilled Sandwalla gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Activate this ability only once each turn.
flavorText:
"Even the smallest creatures are fierce in defense of their own territory."
—Vivien Reid

name: Kraul Harpooner
rulesText:
Reach
Undergrowth — When Kraul Harpooner enters the battlefield, choose up to one target creature with flying you don't control. Kraul Harpooner gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the number of creature cards in your graveyard, then you may have Kraul Harpooner fight that creature.

name: Erratic Visionary
rulesText: {1}{U}, {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.
flavorText: An Izzet experiment begins with a "what if," gets approved with a "why not," and concludes with a "eureka!"

name: Niv-Mizzet, Parun
rulesText:
This spell can't be countered.
Flying
Whenever you draw a card, Niv-Mizzet, Parun deals 1 damage to any target.
Whenever a player casts an instant or sorcery spell, you draw a card.

name: Foreboding Fruit
rulesText:
Target player draws two cards and loses 2 life.
Adamant — If at least three black mana was spent to cast this spell, create a Food token. (It's an artifact with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.")

name: Temple of Deceit
rulesText:
Temple of Deceit enters the battlefield tapped.
When Temple of Deceit enters the battlefield, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
{T}: Add {U} or {B}.

name: Duress
rulesText: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a noncreature, nonland card from it. That player discards that card.
flavorText: "Don't worry. I'm not going to deprive you of all your secrets. Just your most precious one." —Liliana Vess

name: Bartered Cow
rulesText: When Bartered Cow dies or when you discard it, create a Food token. (It's an artifact with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.")
flavorText: At the market, no one heeded Hilda's frantic mooing. The fae curse was turning out even worse than she had feared.

name: Garenbrig Paladin
rulesText:
Adamant — If at least three green mana was spent to cast this spell, Garenbrig Paladin enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it.
Garenbrig Paladin can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less.

name: Wavebreak Hippocamp
rulesText: Whenever you cast your first spell during each opponent's turn, draw a card.
flavorText: Tritons search for omens in its wake.

name: Negate
rulesText: Counter target noncreature spell.
flavorText: "As one, nature lifts its voice to tell you this: 'No.'"

name: Sunhome Stalwart
rulesText:
First strike
Mentor (Whenever this creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on target attacking creature with lesser power.)
flavorText: "Before I let you wield one of these, let's see you dodge one!"

name: Rising Populace
rulesText: Whenever another creature or planeswalker you control dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Rising Populace.
flavorText: Grief is a crucible where resolve is tempered.

name: Blade Juggler
rulesText:
Spectacle {2}{B} (You may cast this spell for its spectacle cost rather than its mana cost if an opponent lost life this turn.)
When Blade Juggler enters the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to you and you draw a card.

name: Incubation Druid
rulesText:
{T}: Add one mana of any type that a land you control could produce. If Incubation Druid has a +1/+1 counter on it, add three mana of that type instead.
{3}{G}{G}: Adapt 3. (If this creature has no +1/+1 counters on it, put three +1/+1 counters on it.)

name: Growth Spiral
rulesText: Draw a card. You may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield.

Trample, vigilance

name: Torch Courier
rulesText:
Haste
Sacrifice Torch Courier: Another target creature gains haste until end of turn.
flavorText: "Light a torch and deliver this letter" were his instructions, which he unfortunately reversed.

name: Final Flare
rulesText:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature or enchantment.

name: Haazda Officer
rulesText: When Haazda Officer enters the battlefield, target creature you control gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

name: Heraldic Banner
rulesText:
As Heraldic Banner enters the battlefield, choose a color.
Creatures you control of the chosen color get +1/+0.
{T}: Add one mana of the chosen color.

name: Kaheera, the Orphanguard
rulesText:
Companion — Each creature card in your starting deck is a Cat, Elemental, Nightmare, Dinosaur, or Beast card. (If this card is your chosen companion, you may cast it once from outside the game.)
Vigilance
Each other creature you control that's a Cat, Elemental, Nightmare, Dinosaur, or Beast gets +1/+1 and has vigilance.

rulesText:
Trample

"I might have overfed him."
—Gulistan, Simic biomancer

name: Wall of Runes
rulesText:
Defender
When Wall of Runes enters the battlefield, scry 1.

"It's strangely satisfying seeing an undead killing machine from another world standing befuddled in front of a wall of text."
—Lavinia

name: Indatha Crystal
rulesText:
{T}: Add {W}, {B}, or {G}.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

name: Rakdos Guildgate
rulesText:
Rakdos Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {B} or {R}.
flavorText: Maze-runners who pass through the Rakdos gate leave behind their scruples and a significant amount of skin.

name: Heartless Act
rulesText:
Choose one —
• Destroy target creature with no counters on it.
• Remove up to three counters from target creature.
flavorText:
"It's them or us."
—General Kudro

name: Blazing Volley
rulesText: Blazing Volley deals 1 damage to each creature your opponents control.
flavorText:
"Don't ask me what to do if you miss. They're stingdrakes. Don't miss."
—Orthion, Lavabrink captain

name: Truefire Captain
rulesText:
Mentor (Whenever this creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on target attacking creature with lesser power.)
Whenever Truefire Captain is dealt damage, it deals that much damage to target player.

name: Time Wipe
rulesText: Return a creature you control to its owner's hand, then destroy all creatures.

"To comprehend the full answer requires years of temporal study. In short, they were now never born in the first place."
—Teferi

name: Unbreakable Bond
rulesText: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield with a lifelink counter on it.
flavorText:
From now until the crystals stop glowing
—Ketria oath meaning "forever"

name: Manifold Key
rulesText:
{1}, {T}: Untap another target artifact.
{3}, {T}: Target creature can't be blocked this turn.

"Locks want to be opened, and treasure wants to be free."
—Nayrex Slipfinger, master thief

You may look at the top card of your library any time.

You can't play lands or cast spells from your hand.
{3}{R}: Destroy Experimental Frenzy.
flavorText: Turns out coffee is the weird aunt of invention.

name: Worthy Knight
rulesText: Whenever you cast a Knight spell, create a 1/1 white Human creature token.

name: Gargos, Vicious Watcher
rulesText:
Vigilance
Hydra spells you cast cost {4} less to cast.
Whenever a creature you control becomes the target of a spell, Gargos, Vicious Watcher fights up to one target creature you don't control.

name: Skeleton Archer
rulesText: When Skeleton Archer enters the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to any target.

"When it comes to killing with precision, a soul is but a hindrance."
—Isareth the Awakener

name: Canopy Spider

name: Grim Physician

rulesText: Ivy Elemental enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it.

name: Pouncing Shoreshark
rulesText:
Mutate {3}{U} (If you cast this spell for its mutate cost, put it over or under target non-Human creature you own. They mutate into the creature on top plus all abilities from under it.)
Flash
Whenever this creature mutates, you may return target creature an opponent controls to its owner's hand.

This spell costs {1} less to cast for each Gate you control.

Whenever Ayara, First of Locthwain or another black creature enters the battlefield under your control, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
{T}, Sacrifice another black creature: Draw a card.

rulesText:
Tap target permanent. If it's an artifact, destroy it.
Draw a card.

rulesText:

rulesText:
Sunder Shaman can't be blocked by more than one creature.

flavorText: "You take our wilds, we take your city."

rulesText: As long as it's not your turn, spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
flavorText:
"Wave-borne, he watches over secrets of the shore."
—Psemilla, Meletian poet

name: Archon of Falling Stars
rulesText:
Flying
When Archon of Falling Stars dies, you may return target enchantment card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
flavorText:
"The archon fell like a star from the sky, meeting the rising sun at the horizon's edge."
—*The Cosmogony*

name: Gray Merchant of Asphodel
rulesText: When Gray Merchant of Asphodel enters the battlefield, each opponent loses X life, where X is your devotion to black. You gain life equal to the life lost this way. (Each {B} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to black.)

name: Huntmaster Liger
rulesText:
Mutate {2}{W} (If you cast this spell for its mutate cost, put it over or under target non-Human creature you own. They mutate into the creature on top plus all abilities from under it.)
Whenever this creature mutates, other creatures you control get +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of times this creature has mutated.

name: Deface
rulesText:
Choose one —
• Destroy target artifact.
• Destroy target creature with defender.
flavorText:
"Leave no stone unturned."
—Ruric Thar

name: Fire Elemental
flavorText: It treads on feet of coals and strikes with the force of a volcano.

rulesText:
Blast Zone enters the battlefield with a charge counter on it.
{T}: Add {C}.
{X}{X}, {T}: Put X charge counters on Blast Zone.
{3}, {T}, Sacrifice Blast Zone: Destroy each nonland permanent with converted mana cost equal to the number of charge counters on Blast Zone.

rulesText:
Target creature gets -3/-0 until end of turn.
Surveil 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on the top of your library in any order.)

name: Humongulus
rulesText: Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
flavorText: Searching the city for Fblthp felt like sifting the rain for a single drop of blood.

name: Giant Opportunity

flavorText: They look tasty, but best to plant them.

name: Underworld Charger
rulesText:
Underworld Charger can't block.
Escape—{4}{B}, Exile three other cards from your graveyard. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its escape cost.)
Underworld Charger escapes with two +1/+1 counters on it.

name: Rampaging Monument
rulesText:
Trample
Rampaging Monument enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it.
Whenever you cast a multicolored spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Rampaging Monument.
flavorText: "Be advised: suspect is nine stories tall, marble hair, answers to Saint Gusztav."

name: Domri's Nodorog
rulesText:
Trample
When Domri's Nodorog enters the battlefield, you may search your library and/or graveyard for a card named Domri, City Smasher, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you search your library this way, shuffle it.
flavorText: "Good girl."

name: Skull Prophet
rulesText:
{T}: Add {B} or {G}.
{T}: Put the top two cards of your library into your graveyard.
flavorText: "I study bone because that's where truth dwells. One monster knucklebone is wiser than all that damp meat in your head."

name: Widespread Brutality
rulesText: Amass 2, then the Army you amassed deals damage equal to its power to each non-Army creature. (To amass 2, put two +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)

name: Haazda Marshal
rulesText: Whenever Haazda Marshal and at least two other creatures attack, create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token with lifelink.

name: Springjaw Trap
rulesText:
Flash
{4}, {T}, Sacrifice Springjaw Trap: It deals 3 damage to any target.
flavorText:
"Stop trying to pierce the hide. Hit where it's softest: ankle, sole, hamstring."
—Master Hunter Chevill

name: Fry
rulesText:
This spell can't be countered.
Fry deals 5 damage to target creature or planeswalker that's white or blue.
flavorText:
"I'm afraid your dinner got a little . . . overcooked."
—Marlan Farthwald, innkeeper

name: Toll of the Invasion
rulesText:
Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card.
Amass 1. (Put a +1/+1 counter on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)

rulesText: Each player puts the top four cards of their library into their graveyard. Return up to two instant and/or sorcery cards from your graveyard to your hand. Exile Bond of Insight.
flavorText: "Together we can unlock secrets no one has even dreamed of. I might even let you remember some of them."

name: Citywide Bust
rulesText: Destroy all creatures with toughness 4 or greater.
flavorText:
"Oh, you fellas are going to love the lockup. Excellent gruel. Very low ceilings."
—Libuse, Boros sergeant

name: Woe Strider
rulesText:
When Woe Strider enters the battlefield, create a 0/1 white Goat creature token.

Escape—{3}{B}{B}, Exile four other cards from your graveyard. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its escape cost.)

name: Dimir Locket
rulesText:
{T}: Add {U} or {B}.
{U/B}{U/B}{U/B}{U/B}, {T}, Sacrifice Dimir Locket: Draw two cards.
flavorText:
"Wear this, and take your place among the shadows—wise, lethal, and unseen."
—Ivrelya, Dimir spymaster

name: Oakhame Adversary
rulesText:
This spell costs {2} less to cast if an opponent controls a green permanent.
Deathtouch
Whenever Oakhame Adversary deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.
flavorText: The elves remember every secret path from the days when they ruled the realm.

name: God-Eternal Oketra
rulesText:
Double strike
Whenever you cast a creature spell, create a 4/4 black Zombie Warrior creature token with vigilance.
When God-Eternal Oketra dies or is put into exile from the battlefield, you may put it into its owner's library third from the top.

name: Gatebreaker Ram
rulesText:
Gatebreaker Ram gets +1/+1 for each Gate you control.

name: Knight of the Ebon Legion
rulesText:
{2}{B}: Knight of the Ebon Legion gets +3/+3 and gains deathtouch until end of turn.
At the beginning of your end step, if a player lost 4 or more life this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Knight of the Ebon Legion. (Damage causes loss of life.)

name: Loyal Pegasus
rulesText:
Flying
Loyal Pegasus can't attack or block alone.
flavorText:
"Even if I should die in the saddle, she will not let me fall to the ground."
—Hypatia of the Winged Horse

name: Gates Ablaze
rulesText: Gates Ablaze deals X damage to each creature, where X is the number of Gates you control.
flavorText: When the Izzet's spirit of invention extends to the city's infrastructure, the results are sometimes explosive.

name: Temple of Abandon
rulesText:
Temple of Abandon enters the battlefield tapped.
When Temple of Abandon enters the battlefield, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
{T}: Add {R} or {G}.

name: Dimir Spybug
rulesText:
Flying
Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
Whenever you surveil, put a +1/+1 counter on Dimir Spybug.
flavorText: Just assume every conversation is on record.

name: Lurrus of the Dream-Den
rulesText:
Companion — Each permanent card in your starting deck has converted mana cost 2 or less. (If this card is your chosen companion, you may cast it once from outside the game.)
Lifelink
During each of your turns, you may cast one permanent spell with converted mana cost 2 or less from your graveyard.

name: Sphinx of New Prahv
rulesText:
Flying, vigilance
Spells your opponents cast that target Sphinx of New Prahv cost {2} more to cast.

name: Rubblebelt Runner
rulesText: Rubblebelt Runner can't be blocked by creature tokens.

name: Leonin of the Lost Pride
rulesText: When Leonin of the Lost Pride dies, exile target card from an opponent's graveyard.

name: Kraul Raider
rulesText: Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

name: Tome of the Guildpact
rulesText:
Whenever you cast a multicolored spell, draw a card.
{T}: Add one mana of any color.
flavorText:
"Reading it has given me a glimpse of what makes this deeply flawed city so very magnificent."
—Dovin Baan

name: Frillscare Mentor
rulesText:
When Frillscare Mentor enters the battlefield, put a menace counter on target non-Human creature you control. (It can't be blocked except by two or more creatures)
{2}{R}, {T}: Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control with menace.
flavorText: Fortune favors the ferocious.

name: Tolsimir, Friend to Wolves

When Tolsimir, Friend to Wolves enters the battlefield, create Voja, Friend to Elves, a legendary 3/3 green and white Wolf creature token.

—*The Callapheia*

name: Essence Symbiote
rulesText: Whenever a creature you control mutates, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature and you gain 2 life.
flavorText: The Ozolith's appearance spawned a new era of wild mutation on Ikoria. Some creatures hunted different prey, lived in new habitats, and thrived on mutation itself.

name: Tomik, Distinguished Advokist
rulesText:
Flying
Lands on the battlefield and land cards in graveyards can't be the targets of spells or abilities your opponents control.
Your opponents can't play land cards from graveyards.
flavorText: "Some bend the law. I tie it into knots."

name: Cavalier of Flame
rulesText:
{1}{R}: Creatures you control get +1/+0 and gain haste until end of turn.
When Cavalier of Flame enters the battlefield, discard any number of cards, then draw that many cards.
When Cavalier of Flame dies, it deals X damage to each opponent and each planeswalker they control, where X is the number of land cards in your graveyard.

name: Lochmere Serpent
rulesText:
Flash
{U}, Sacrifice an Island: Lochmere Serpent can't be blocked this turn.
{B}, Sacrifice a Swamp: You gain 1 life and draw a card.
{U}{B}: Exile five target cards from an opponent's graveyard. Return Lochmere Serpent from your graveyard to your hand. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

name: Mystic Forge
rulesText:
You may look at the top card of your library any time.
You may cast artifact spells and colorless spells from the top of your library.
{T}, Pay 1 life: Exile the top card of your library.

name: Volcanic Dragon
rulesText:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)
flavorText: Sometimes an eruption in Shiv produces something more dangerous than a mere river of molten rock.

name: Phalanx Tactics
rulesText: Target creature you control gets +2/+1 until end of turn. Each other creature you control gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavorText: Every soldier has a place to stand and a role to play.

name: Thicket Crasher
rulesText:
Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)
Other Elementals you control have trample.
flavorText:
"Tread too hard in the forest and it will tread on you in return."
—Vivien Reid

name: Huatli's Raptor
rulesText:
Vigilance
When Huatli's Raptor enters the battlefield, proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)
flavorText: The essence of Ixalan was never far from Huatli's heart.

name: Sky Theater Strix
rulesText:
Flying
Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, Sky Theater Strix gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavorText: Courier owls joined the fray, attacking the Dreadhorde with a viciousness usually reserved for mail thieves.

name: Darkblade Agent
rulesText: As long as you've surveilled this turn, Darkblade Agent has deathtouch and "Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, you draw a card."
flavorText: "I've seen your house, and you've been a lovely, if unwitting, host. But at last it's time for farewells."

name: Passwall Adept
rulesText: {2}{U}: Target creature can't be blocked this turn.
flavorText: "My doors are called trespassing, my signatures, forgeries. They don't respect my talents, and I don't respect their labels."

name: Trostani Discordant
rulesText:
Other creatures you control get +1/+1.
When Trostani Discordant enters the battlefield, create two 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens with lifelink.
At the beginning of your end step, each player gains control of all creatures they own.

name: Attendant of Vraska
rulesText: When Attendant of Vraska dies, if you control a Vraska planeswalker, you gain life equal to Attendant of Vraska's power.
flavorText: When the Erstwhile were unearthed from their tombs, they became a ready-made army for Vraska.

name: Repeated Reverberation
rulesText: When you next cast an instant spell, cast a sorcery spell, or activate a loyalty ability this turn, copy that spell or ability twice. You may choose new targets for the copies.
flavorText: It's in the nature of fire to grow.

name: Camaraderie
rulesText: You gain X life and draw X cards, where X is the number of creatures you control. Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavorText:
"Within the song of Mat'Selesnya, one becomes all."
—Heruj, Selesnya hierophant

name: Reduce to Ashes
rulesText: Reduce to Ashes deals 5 damage to target creature. If that creature would die this turn, exile it instead.
flavorText:
"Before they can go to their final rest, the wicked must be purified by fire."
—Harra the Adjudicator

name: Athreos, Shroud-Veiled
rulesText:
Indestructible
As long as your devotion to white and black is less than seven, Athreos isn't a creature.
At the beginning of your end step, put a coin counter on another target creature.
Whenever a creature with a coin counter on it dies or is put into exile, return that card to the battlefield under your control.

name: Blindblast
rulesText:
Blindblast deals 1 damage to target creature. That creature can't block this turn.
Draw a card.
flavorText:
"Peril is in the eye of the beholder. At least, if your aim is good."
—Jaya Ballard

name: The Magic Mirror
rulesText:
This spell costs {1} less to cast for each instant and sorcery card in your graveyard.
You have no maximum hand size.
At the beginning of your upkeep, put a knowledge counter on The Magic Mirror, then draw a card for each knowledge counter on The Magic Mirror.

name: Azorius Knight-Arbiter
rulesText:
Vigilance
Azorius Knight-Arbiter can't be blocked.
flavorText: Thanks to the magic of his Writ of Passage, alms beasts lumbered aside, anarchs bowed their heads, and even Rakdos acrobats rolled their spikewheels out of his way.

name: Korvold, Fae-Cursed King
rulesText:
Flying
Whenever Korvold, Fae-Cursed King enters the battlefield or attacks, sacrifice another permanent.
Whenever you sacrifice a permanent, put a +1/+1 counter on Korvold and draw a card.
flavorText: Transformed at his own wedding, he promptly ate the banquet, the gifts, and the guests.

name: Claim the Firstborn
rulesText: Gain control of target creature with converted mana cost 3 or less until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn.
flavorText:
"The deal was struck and the favor had been done. And so, under the cover of night, the debt was paid."
—*Tales of the Fae*

name: Scuttlegator
rulesText:
Defender
{6}{G/U}{G/U}: Adapt 3. (If this creature has no +1/+1 counters on it, put three +1/+1 counters on it.)
As long as Scuttlegator has a +1/+1 counter on it, it can attack as though it didn't have defender.

name: Screaming Shield
rulesText:
Equipped creature gets +0/+3 and has "{2}, {T}: Target player puts the top three cards of their library into their graveyard."
Equip {3} ({3}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)
flavorText: Shhh . . .

name: Majestic Auricorn
rulesText:
Mutate {3}{W} (If you cast this spell for its mutate cost, put it over or under target non-Human creature you own. They mutate into the creature on top plus all abilities from under it.)
Vigilance
Whenever this creature mutates, you gain 4 life.

name: Clackbridge Troll
rulesText:
Trample, haste
When Clackbridge Troll enters the battlefield, target opponent creates three 0/1 white Goat creature tokens.
At the beginning of combat on your turn, any opponent may sacrifice a creature. If a player does, tap Clackbridge Troll, you gain 3 life, and you draw a card.

name: Sundering Stroke
rulesText: Sundering Stroke deals 7 damage divided as you choose among one, two, or three targets. If at least seven red mana was spent to cast this spell, instead Sundering Stroke deals 7 damage to each of those permanents and/or players.

name: Dreadful Apathy
rulesText:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack or block.
{2}{W}: Exile enchanted creature.
flavorText: Those whose lives were uninspired are doomed to the wretched tedium of Phylias in death.

name: Cling to Dust
rulesText:
Exile target card from a graveyard. If it was a creature card, you gain 3 life. Otherwise, you draw a card.
Escape—{3}{B}, Exile five other cards from your graveyard. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its escape cost.)
flavorText: In bleak Tizerus, all hope crumbles in your grasp.

name: Blood Burglar
rulesText: As long as it's your turn, Blood Burglar has lifelink. (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)
flavorText:
"You've heard that a vampire can't enter a home without an invitation? A lie meant to help you sleep at night."
—Kerin, watch sergeant

name: Inspire Awe
rulesText: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn except by enchanted creatures and enchantment creatures. Scry 2.
flavorText: Nylea appeared amid the howl of a hundred beasts.

name: Herald of the Dreadhorde
rulesText: When Herald of the Dreadhorde dies, amass 2. (Put two +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)
flavorText: Amonkhet's dead flowed into a new world in service to their God-Pharaoh.

name: Act of Treason
rulesText: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn. (It can attack and {T} this turn.)
flavorText: Seen through Rakdos eyes, a cruel betrayal is a hilarious stunt.

name: Conclave Guildmage
rulesText:
{G}, {T}: Creatures you control gain trample until end of turn.
{5}{W}, {T}: Create a 2/2 green and white Elf Knight creature token with vigilance.

name: Daxos, Blessed by the Sun
rulesText:
Daxos's toughness is equal to your devotion to white. (Each {W} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to white.)
Whenever another creature you control enters the battlefield or dies, you gain 1 life.

name: Barrow Witches
rulesText: When Barrow Witches enters the battlefield, return target Knight card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavorText:
"Taste the sweetness, breath for breath. Keep the balance, death for death."
—Barrow witch incantation

name: Embodiment of Agonies
rulesText:
Flying, deathtouch
Embodiment of Agonies enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each different mana cost among nonland cards in your graveyard. (For example, {2}{B} and {1}{B}{B} are different mana costs.)
flavorText: "I feel your pain. It's exquisite."

name: Naga Eternal
flavorText:
"I recognize that headdress. This one was feared even by her fellow initiates."
—Samut

name: Rally to Battle
rulesText: Creatures you control get +1/+3 until end of turn. Untap them.
flavorText: The guildmasters loom large in the political sphere, but in the end, the rulers of Ravnica are its people.

name: Leyline of Anticipation
rulesText:
If Leyline of Anticipation is in your opening hand, you may begin the game with it on the battlefield.
You may cast spells as though they had flash.

name: Master Splicer
rulesText:
When Master Splicer enters the battlefield, create a 3/3 colorless Golem artifact creature token.
Golems you control get +1/+1.
flavorText: Phyrexian artificers remove the flesh they no longer need and use it to bring their unholy creations to a greater semblance of life.

rulesText:
Choose up to four target cards in your graveyard. If you control a Bolas planeswalker, return those cards to your hand. Otherwise, an opponent chooses two of them. Leave the chosen cards in your graveyard and put the rest into your hand.
Exile Deliver Unto Evil.

name: Workshop Elders
rulesText:
Artifact creatures you control have flying.

"Fear not what's under the bed. The toys are watching."
—*Beyond the Great Henge*

name: Veiled Shade
rulesText: {1}{B}: Veiled Shade gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavorText:
"I sang songs of sorrow for my lost love. Imagine my horror when, one night, they were answered."
—Milana, Orzhov prelate

name: Labyrinth of Skophos
rulesText:
{T}: Add {C}.
{4}, {T}: Remove target attacking or blocking creature from combat.
flavorText: For centuries, the minotaur polis of Skophos was unknown to humans. It remains unexplored.

name: Selesnya Locket
rulesText:
{T}: Add {G} or {W}.
{G/W}{G/W}{G/W}{G/W}, {T}, Sacrifice Selesnya Locket: Draw two cards.
flavorText:
"Think of the locket as a seed you bear, spreading life from Vitu-Ghazi across all of Ravnica."
—Heruj, Selesnya hierophant

name: Unexplained Vision
rulesText:
Draw three cards.
Adamant — If at least three blue mana was spent to cast this spell, scry 3.

name: Entrancing Lyre
rulesText:
You may choose not to untap Entrancing Lyre during your untap step.
{X}, {T}: Tap target creature with power X or less. It doesn't untap during its controller's untap step for as long as Entrancing Lyre remains tapped.
flavorText: Its strings are wayward threads of fate.

rulesText: Chandra's Flame Wave deals 2 damage to target player and each creature that player controls. Search your library and/or graveyard for a card named Chandra, Flame's Fury, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you search your library this way, shuffle it.

name: Karn's Bastion
rulesText:
{T}: Add {C}.
{4}, {T}: Proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)
flavorText:
"I can't protect everyone here. But those I can, I will."
—Karn

name: Chainwhip Cyclops
rulesText: {3}{R}: Target creature can't block this turn.
flavorText:
"You say this Tenth District, not Rubblebelt. But where smash happen, that Rubblebelt. Rubblebelt state of mind."
—Urgdar, cyclops philosopher

name: Thunder Drake
rulesText:
Flying
Whenever you cast your second spell each turn, put a +1/+1 counter on Thunder Drake.
flavorText: The arrival of the Planar Bridge caused eddies in the aether, creating some entirely new species while transforming others.

name: Aeromunculus
rulesText:
Flying
{2}{G}{U}: Adapt 1. (If this creature has no +1/+1 counters on it, put a +1/+1 counter on it.)
flavorText:
"The absence of binocular vision imposes certain challenges for a flying creature, which are overcome via echolocation."
—Simic research notes

name: Imposing Vantasaur
rulesText:
Vigilance
Cycling {1} ({1}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
flavorText: Raugrin's coastline can be quite beautiful, as long as you avoid the volcanic dinosaurs, the sea dinosaurs, and the roaming beach dinosaurs.

name: Ferocious Pup
rulesText: When Ferocious Pup enters the battlefield, create a 2/2 green Wolf creature token.
flavorText: The strongest pack has the fiercest pups.

rulesText:
Defender, reach
{4}{G}: Grappling Sundew gains indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy this creature.)

name: Underworld Rage-Hound
rulesText:
Underworld Rage-Hound attacks each combat if able.
Escape—{3}{R}, Exile three other cards from your graveyard. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its escape cost.)
Underworld Rage-Hound escapes with a +1/+1 counter on it.

name: Arlinn, Voice of the Pack
rulesText:
Each creature you control that's a Wolf or a Werewolf enters the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it.
−2: Create a 2/2 green Wolf creature token.

name: Erstwhile Trooper
rulesText: Discard a creature card: Erstwhile Trooper gets +2/+2 and gains trample until end of turn. Activate this ability only once each turn.
flavorText:
"The Erstwhile—rotten of body and outmoded in dress, but unfailing in loyalty."
—Vraska

name: Moment of Heroism
rulesText: Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains lifelink until end of turn. (Damage dealt by the creature also causes its controller to gain that much life.)
flavorText: "My faith is stronger than fang, claw, or mindless hunger."

name: Gatekeeper Gargoyle
rulesText:
Flying
Gatekeeper Gargoyle enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each Gate you control.

name: Prickly Marmoset
rulesText:
First strike
Whenever you cycle a card, Prickly Marmoset gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavorText:
"It's either terrified or extremely mad at us, definitely one of the two."
—Jonald, mission naturalist

name: Karn, the Great Creator
rulesText:
Activated abilities of artifacts your opponents control can't be activated.
+1: Until your next turn, up to one target noncreature artifact becomes an artifact creature with power and toughness each equal to its converted mana cost.
−2: You may choose an artifact card you own from outside the game or in exile, reveal that card, and put it into your hand.

name: Portcullis Vine
rulesText:
Defender
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature with defender: Draw a card.

name: Nexus Wardens
rulesText:
Reach
Constellation — Whenever an enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 2 life.

name: Labyrinth Raptor
rulesText:
Menace
Whenever a creature you control with menace becomes blocked, defending player sacrifices a creature blocking it.
{B}{R}: Creatures you control with menace get +1/+0 until end of turn.

name: Chemister's Insight
rulesText:
Draw two cards.
Jump-start (You may cast this card from your graveyard by discarding a card in addition to paying its other costs. Then exile this card.)
flavorText: "My specialty is theoretical universal limits and ways to circumvent them."

name: Goblin Banneret
rulesText:
Mentor (Whenever this creature attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on target attacking creature with lesser power.)
{1}{R}: Goblin Banneret gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavorText: The Boros banner stands tall even if its bearer doesn't.

name: Daybreak Chimera
rulesText:
This spell costs {X} less to cast, where X is your devotion to white. (Each {W} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts towards your devotion to white.)
Flying

name: Necrotic Wound
rulesText: Undergrowth — Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the number of creature cards in your graveyard. If that creature would die this turn, exile it instead.
flavorText: The assassins of Ochran distill toxins from the remains of the previous victims.

name: Dovin, Architect of Law
rulesText:
+1: You gain 2 life and draw a card.
−1: Tap target creature. It doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.
−9: Tap all permanents target opponent controls. That player skips their next untap step.

name: Chain to Memory
rulesText: Target creature gets -4/-0 until end of turn. Scry 2.
flavorText: Those who do not learn from their mistakes are bound to relive them.

name: Spelleater Wolverine
rulesText: Spelleater Wolverine has double strike as long as there are three or more instant and/or sorcery cards in your graveyard.
flavorText:
"The monster that scares me the most isn't the biggest."
—Taelya, Lavabrink pyromage

name: Hateful Eidolon
rulesText:
Lifelink
Whenever an enchanted creature dies, draw a card for each Aura you controlled that was attached to it.
flavorText: From the echoes of a violent life, a terrible foe is born.

name: Tournament Grounds
rulesText:
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}: Add {R}, {W}, or {B}. Spend this mana only to cast a Knight or Equipment spell.
flavorText: No one knows when the tournament began. All they know is that it will never end.

name: Rise to Glory
rulesText:
Choose one or both —
• Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
• Return target Aura card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
flavorText: A hero dies, and a legend arises.

name: Durable Coilbug
rulesText: {4}{B}: Return Durable Coilbug from your graveyard to your hand.
flavorText:
"I've seen them survive lava, trampling, and a moloch's digestive system. They just roll out and get on with their lives!"
—Gannet, Skysail zoologist

name: Pharika's Spawn
rulesText:
Escape—{5}{B}, Exile three other cards from your graveyard. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its escape cost.)
Pharika's Spawn escapes with two +1/+1 counters on it. When it enters the battlefield this way, each opponent sacrifices a non-Gorgon creature.

name: Blow Your House Down
rulesText: Up to three target creatures can't block this turn. Destroy any of them that are Walls.
flavorText:
"You think these walls will protect you?
My, you have a dim view of the power of the wilds"
—Marawen, barrow witch

name: Domri's Ambush
rulesText: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. Then that creature deals damage equal to its power to target creature or planeswalker you don't control.
flavorText: "When civilization teeters on the brink, I'll be there to kick it the rest of the way."

name: Kenrith's Transformation
rulesText:
Enchant creature
When Kenrith's Transformation enters the battlefield, draw a card.
Enchanted creature loses all abilities and is a green Elk creature with base power and toughness 3/3. (It loses all other card types and creature types.)

name: All That Glitters
rulesText:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each artifact and/or enchantment you control.
flavorText: A faerie's glee at her trove quickly fades to contentment, then to boredom, then to an urge to steal more.

name: Aerial Assault
rulesText: Destroy target tapped creature. You gain 1 life for each creature you control with flying.
flavorText:
"Oh, you must be mistaken. Hawks are solitary hunters, you see."
—Bunder Diedreck, ornithologist

name: Sphinx Mindbreaker
rulesText:
Flying
When Sphinx Mindbreaker enters the battlefield, each opponent puts the top ten cards of their library into their graveyard.
flavorText: Riddles draw you in, paradoxes hold you fast, and answers shatter your perception.

name: Fateful End
rulesText: Fateful End deals 3 damage to any target. Scry 1.
flavorText:
"Everything will be put back in its proper place."
—Klothys, god of destiny

name: Erebos, Bleak-Hearted
rulesText:
Indestructible
As long as your devotion to black is less than five, Erebos isn't a creature.
Whenever another creature you control dies, you may pay 2 life. If you do, draw a card.
{1}{B}, Sacrifice another creature: Target creature gets -2/-1 until end of turn.

name: General Kudro of Drannith
rulesText:
Other Humans you control get +1/+1.
Whenever General Kudro of Drannith or another Human enters the battlefield under your control, exile target card from an opponent's graveyard.
{2}, Sacrifice two Humans: Destroy target creature with power 4 or greater.

name: Citywatch Sphinx
rulesText:
Flying
When Citywatch Sphinx dies, surveil 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on the top of your library in any order.)
flavorText: All those who trade in questions must answer to the Dimir.

name: Gateway Plaza
rulesText:
Gateway Plaza enters the battlefield tapped.
When Gateway Plaza enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you pay {1}.
{T}: Add one mana of any color.
flavorText: The Chamber of the Guildpact stands as a reminder that even the bitterest struggles can end in cooperation.

name: Devkarin Dissident
rulesText: {4}{G}: Devkarin Dissident gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavorText: "This is Mileva, in the Tenth. We've got an elf in the plaza with a chip on her shoulder. Actually, it's more of a morningstar."

name: Piper of the Swarm
rulesText:
Rats you control have menace.
{1}{B}, {T}: Create a 1/1 black Rat creature token.
{2}{B}{B}, {T}, Sacrifice three Rats: Gain control of target creature.
flavorText: "If it has ears, it will dance to my tune."

name: Ruinous Ultimatum
rulesText: Destroy all nonland permanents your opponents control.
flavorText:
"Strike those abominations down. Let their names rot with their remains."
—General Kudro

name: Molderhulk
rulesText:
Undergrowth — This spell costs {1} less to cast for each creature card in your graveyard.
When Molderhulk enters the battlefield, return target land card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

name: The Cauldron of Eternity
rulesText:
This spell costs {2} less to cast for each creature card in your graveyard.
Whenever a creature you control dies, put it on the bottom of its owner's library.
{2}{B}, {T}, Pay 2 life: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

name: Evolving Wilds
rulesText: {T}, Sacrifice Evolving Wilds: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.
flavorText:
"It's not hard to grasp that this land does not belong to us."
—Gavi, nest waren

name: Forced Landing
rulesText: Put target creature with flying on the bottom of its owner's library.
flavorText: The druid knew only one spell, a charm to encourage rapid plant growth. When airborne Eternals invaded her arboretum, she had to get creative.

name: Hired Poisoner
rulesText: Deathtouch
flavorText: "They don't even feel the cut. I'm ordering a drink in a nearby tavern before anyone notices something's wrong."

name: Eternal Taskmaster
rulesText:
Eternal Taskmaster enters the battlefield tapped.
Whenever Eternal Taskmaster attacks, you may pay {2}{B}. If you do, return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavorText:
"They are called Eternals. They will never stop."
—Jace Beleren

name: Soul Diviner
rulesText: {T}, Remove a counter from an artifact, creature, land, or planeswalker you control: Draw a card.
flavorText: As the Eternal's cold fingers tightened around his throat, Domri realized what kind of master he had rushed to serve.

name: Dawning Angel
rulesText:
Flying
When Dawning Angel enters the battlefield, you gain 4 life.
flavorText:
"As the sun rose behind the Bone Spire, an angel appeared over the charnel fields, bringing a surge of new hope."
—Krinnea, *Siege of the Bone Spire*

name: Cauldron Familiar
rulesText:
When Cauldron Familiar enters the battlefield, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.
Sacrifice a Food: Return Cauldron Familiar from your graveyard to the battlefield.
flavorText: Every day the cat returns to kill the same mouse, which sinks again into the cauldron's brew.

name: Guild Globe
rulesText:
When Guild Globe enters the battlefield, draw a card.
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Guild Globe: Add two mana of different colors.
flavorText:
"Hopefully Ravnica will prove harder to break."
—Karn

name: Disenchant
rulesText: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
flavorText: Where the holy light of the angels has shone, only purity remains.

name: Pause for Reflection
rulesText:
Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)
Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.

name: Arclight Phoenix
rulesText:
Flying, haste
At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you've cast three or more instant and sorcery spells this turn, return Arclight Phoenix from your graveyard to the battlefield.

Flying

Flying

"I am sewer-king!" said Rat. "I am quick and cunning and I know every tunnel."
"No, I am king!" said Zombie. "I am cold and deadly and no rot can harm me."
Then Croc came and ate them both.

flavorText: "I bring a flood that nothing can withstand."

name: Wingfold Pteron
rulesText: Wingfold Pteron enters the battlefield with your choice of a flying counter or a hexproof counter on it. (A creature with hexproof can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
flavorText:
"Its weak spot is easily spotted, but only if it's swooping down on you."
—Jonald, mission naturalist

name: Rakdos Firewheeler
rulesText: When Rakdos Firewheeler enters the battlefield, it deals 2 damage to target opponent and 2 damage to up to one target creature or planeswalker.
flavorText: Ever wonder why you never see an old Rakdos Cultist?

name: Field of Ruin
rulesText:
{T}: Add {C}.
{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Field of Ruin: Destroy target nonbasic land an opponent controls. Each player searches their library for a basic land card, puts it onto the battlefield, then shuffles their library.

name: Thunderous Snapper
rulesText: Whenever you cast a spell with converted mana cost 5 or greater, draw a card.
flavorText: While humans hear only a deafening roar, the fae hear music of breathtaking beauty.

name: Aegis Turtle
flavorText:
"The endurance of the ancient turtles in a land so harsh makes a strong case for patience, tranquility, and composure."
—Gavi, nest warden

name: Merchant of the Vale // Haggle
flavorText: "Buying old, worn-out junk. Selling marvels of real value."

name: Defiant Strike
rulesText:
Target creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
Draw a card.
flavorText: "My family was saved thanks to a single Boros soldier. It's why I joined the Legion. I will be the protector now."

name: Brightwood Tracker
rulesText: {5}{G}, {T}: Look at the top four cards of your library. You may reveal a creature card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
flavorText: "Many have walked here, but there is only one trail I seek."

name: Castle Ardenvale
rulesText:
Castle Ardenvale enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a Plains.
{T}: Add {W}.
{2}{W}{W}, {T}: Create a 1/1 white Human creature token.
flavorText: Without Ardenvale's loyalty, the realm would greedily devour itself.

name: Taste of Death
rulesText: Each player sacrifices three creatures. You create three Food tokens. (They're artifacts with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.")
flavorText:
"Hone the knife and mourn the least. Three chimes to sound the sweet, grim feast."
—Barrow witch incantation

name: Notion Rain
rulesText: Surveil 2, then draw two cards. Notion Rain deals 2 damage to you. (To surveil 2, look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on top of your library in any order.)
flavorText: City air is a constant drizzle of private thoughts.

name: Gruesome Menagerie
rulesText: Choose a creature card with converted mana cost 1 in your graveyard, then do the same for creature cards with converted mana costs 2 and 3. Return those cards to the battlefield.
flavorText:
"Variety is also the spice of death."
—Cevraya, Golgari shaman

name: Deathless Knight
rulesText:
Haste
When you gain life for the first time each turn, return Deathless Knight from your graveyard to your hand.
flavorText:
"Headed to the wilds? Beware the dead riders who serve the Shadow Queen."
—Scalan, Edgewall innkeeper

name: Beamsplitter Mage
rulesText: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell that targets only Beamsplitter Mage, if you control one or more other creatures that spell could target, choose one of those creatures. Copy that spell. The copy targets the chosen creature.
flavorText: The Izzet love replicating results.

name: Quench
rulesText: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {2}.
flavorText: "When properly invoked, the plasma globule encloses the offensive spell with a satisfying slurp."

name: Weaponize the Monsters
rulesText: {2}, Sacrifice a creature: Weaponize the Monsters deals 2 damage to any target.
flavorText: Revenge is a path inevitably walked alone.

name: Golgari Guildgate
rulesText:
Golgari Guildgate enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {B} or {G}.
flavorText:
"Shut the gates. In the Underrealm we will outlast the coming doom."
—Vraska

name: Lavakin Brawler
rulesText: Whenever Lavakin Brawler attacks, it gets +1/+0 until end of turn for each Elemental you control.
flavorText: She swings with the ease of flowing lava and hits with the force of a meteor.

name: Grumgully, the Generous
rulesText: Each other non-Human creature you control enters the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it.
flavorText: "Does it matter what it is? Take it and be grateful!"

name: Dimir Informant
rulesText: When Dimir Informant enters the battlefield, surveil 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them into your graveyard and the rest on the top of your library in any order.)
flavorText: The letters arrive, all sealed and read.

name: Lava Coil
rulesText: Lava Coil deals 4 damage to target creature. If that creature would die this turn, exile it instead.
flavorText:
"Commander, we caught the Dimir spy and took her ashes into custody."
—Kramm, Wojek security officer

name: Gingerbread Cabin
rulesText:
({T}: Add {G}.)
Gingerbread Cabin enters the battlefield tapped unless you control three or more other Forests.
When Gingerbread Cabin enters the battlefield untapped, create a Food token. (It's an artifact with "{2}, {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life.")

name: Mortify
rulesText: Destroy target creature or enchantment.
flavorText: Many who cross Sorin's path come down with a sudden and fatal case of being-in-the-way-of-a-millennia-old-vampire.

name: Elite Headhunter
rulesText:
Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
{B/R}{B/R}{B/R}, Sacrifice another creature or an artifact: Elite Headhunter deals 2 damage to target creature or planeswalker.
flavorText: Nothing remains of his foes but the gripping story of their downfall.

name: Callaphe, Beloved of the Sea
rulesText:
Callaphe's power is equal to your devotion to blue. (Each {U} in the mana costs of permanents you control counts toward your devotion to blue.)
Creatures and enchantments you control have "Spells your opponents cast that target this permanent cost {1} more to cast".

name: Elspeth, Sun's Nemesis
rulesText:
−1: Up to two target creatures you control each get +2/+1 until end of turn.
−2: Create two 1/1 white Human Soldier creature tokens.
−3: You gain 5 life.
Escape—{4}{W}{W}, Exile four other cards from your graveyard. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its escape cost.)

name: Turret Ogre
rulesText:
Reach
When Turret Ogre enters the battlefield, if you control another creature with power 4 or greater, Turret Ogre deals 2 damage to each opponent.
flavorText: Common Gruul career aspirations: berserker, shaman, catapult.

name: Sure Strike
rulesText: Target creature gets +3/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn.
flavorText: "I packed three more electroconduits into each test wand. You'll experience a brief tingling sensation."

name: Book Devourer
rulesText:
Trample
Whenever Book Devourer deals combat damage to a player, you may discard all the cards in your hand. If you do, draw that many cards.
flavorText: "Not my first edition of *The Advokist and the Urchin*!"

name: Sharktocrab
rulesText:
{2}{G}{U}: Adapt 1. (If this creature has no +1/+1 counters on it, put a +1/+1 counter on it.)
Whenever one or more +1/+1 counters are put on Sharktocrab, tap target creature an opponent controls. That creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

name: Ogre Errant
rulesText: Whenever Ogre Errant attacks, another target attacking Knight gains menace until end of turn. (It can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
flavorText: Knights kept returning from Ogre's Pass wearing nothing but bruises, so they decided to just pretend it was on their side.

name: Sedge Scorpion
rulesText: Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)
flavorText:
Thakolides the Mighty
Slayer of minotaurs
Vanquisher of giants
Killed by a scorpion
—Inscription on an Akroan grave

name: Victory's Envoy
rulesText: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a +1/+1 counter on each other creature you control.
flavorText: Her paean is the clash of spears, her prayer a battle cry.

name: Silverback Shaman
rulesText:
Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)
When Silverback Shaman dies, draw a card.
flavorText: The apes of Yavimaya draw strength from the spirits of their ancestors.

name: Swathcutter Giant
rulesText:
Vigilance
Whenever Swathcutter Giant attacks, it deals 1 damage to each creature defending player controls.
flavorText:
"Now do you understand what we meant when we said *disperse*?"
—Eksari, Boros patrol leader

name: Captive Audience
rulesText:
Captive Audience enters the battlefield under the control of an opponent of your choice.
At the beginning of your upkeep, choose one that hasn't been chosen —
• Your life total becomes 4.
• Discard your hand.
• Each opponent creates five 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens.

name: Regal Leosaur
rulesText:
Mutate {1}{R/W}{R/W} (If you cast this spell for its mutate cost, put it over or under target non-Human creature you own. They mutate into the creature on top plus all abilities from under it.)
Whenever this creature mutates, other creatures you control get +2/+1 until end of turn.

name: God-Eternal Rhonas
rulesText:
Deathtouch
When God-Eternal Rhonas enters the battlefield, double the power of each other creature you control until end of turn. Those creatures gain vigilance until end of turn.
When God-Eternal Rhonas dies or is put into exile from the battlefield, you may put it into its owner's library third from the top.

name: Hero of the Games
rulesText: Whenever you cast a spell that targets Hero of the Games, creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavorText: Winners of the Iroan Games are forever remembered as heroes of their people.

name: Sage's Row Denizen
rulesText: Whenever another blue creature enters the battlefield under your control, target player puts the top two cards of their library into their graveyard.
flavorText: "Forget what you have learned from other teachers. I bring you the truth."

name: Blood for Bones
rulesText:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
Return a creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield, then return another creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

name: Vantress Gargoyle
rulesText:
Flying
Vantress Gargoyle can't attack unless defending player has seven or more cards in their graveyard.
Vantress Gargoyle can't block unless you have four or more cards in hand.
{T}: Each player puts the top card of their library into their graveyard.

name: Watery Grave
rulesText:
({T}: Add {U} or {B}.)
As Watery Grave enters the battlefield, you may pay 2 life. If you don't, it enters the battlefield tapped.
flavorText: Few believe Duskmantle exists. Fewer find it. None live to bear witness.

name: Vizkopa Vampire
rulesText: Lifelink
flavorText: Orzhov vampires look for allies in unlikely places in case their new guildmaster turns on them. The fate of the Obzedat is proof of Kaya's power and her hatred of the living dead.

name: Angel of Grace
rulesText:
Flash
Flying
When Angel of Grace enters the battlefield, until end of turn, damage that would reduce your life total to less than 1 reduces it to 1 instead.
{4}{W}{W}, Exile Angel of Grace from your graveyard: Your life total becomes 10.

name: The Circle of Loyalty
rulesText:
This spell costs {1} less to cast for each Knight you control.
Creatures you control get +1/+1.
Whenever you cast a legendary spell, create a 2/2 white Knight creature token with vigilance.
{3}{W}, {T}: Create a 2/2 white Knight creature token with vigilance.

name: Splendor Mare
rulesText:
Lifelink
Cycling {1}{W} ({1}{W}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
When you cycle Splendor Mare, put a lifelink counter on target creature you control.

name: Radical Idea
rulesText:
Draw a card.
Jump-start (You may cast this card from your graveyard by discarding a card in addition to paying its other costs. Then exile this card.)
flavorText: Genius is finding the edge of what's possible, then jumping over it.

name: Mystic Subdual
rulesText:
Flash
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets -2/-0 and loses all abilities. (Mutating onto the creature won't give it new abilities. It can gain abilities in other ways.)

name: Zagoth Triome
rulesText:
({T}: Add {B}, {G}, or {U}.)
Zagoth Triome enters the battlefield tapped.
Cycling {3} ({3}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
flavorText: Hunters in the primeval wetlands become fluent in reading the ripples to tell when to pursue and when to flee.

name: Tin Street Dodger
rulesText:
Haste
{R}: Tin Street Dodger can't be blocked this turn except by creatures with defender.
flavorText: "That giant didn't even see me, let alone catch me! And I was close enough to smell him! Of course, that's not saying much."

name: Dance of the Manse
rulesText: Return up to X target artifact and/or non-Aura enchantment cards each with converted mana cost X or less from your graveyard to the battlefield. If X is 6 or more, those permanents are 4/4 creatures in addition to their other types.

name: Arlinn's Wolf
rulesText: Arlinn's Wolf can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less.
flavorText:
"If you don't speak wolf, allow me to translate: 'One step closer and I'll rip out your throat.'"
—Arlinn Kord

name: Mysterious Pathlighter
rulesText:
Flying
Each creature you control that has an Adventure enters the battlefield with an additional +1/+1 counter on it. (It doesn't need to have gone on the adventure first.)
flavorText: For good or ill, most fae can't resist meddling in the adventures of any knight they meet.

name: Gift of Strength
rulesText: Target creature gets +3/+3 and gains reach until end of turn.
flavorText: The Nessian Wood is never without defenders.

name: Loathsome Chimera
rulesText:
Escape—{4}{G}, exile three other cards from your graveyard. (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its escape cost.)
Loathsome Chimera escapes with a +1/+1 counter on it.
flavorText:
"I see... elk? And lion? And... teeth! A lot of teeth!"
—Teraklos of Meletis

name: Walking Corpse
flavorText:
"Feeding a normal army is a problem of logistics. With zombies, it is an asset. Feeding is why they fight. Feeding is why they are feared."
—Jadar, ghoulcaller of Nephalia

name: Devious Cover-Up
rulesText: Counter target spell. If that spell is countered this way, exile it instead of putting it into its owner's graveyard. You may shuffle up to four target cards from your graveyard into your library.
flavorText: First, dispose of the evidence. Then dispose of your knowledge of the disposal.

name: Prismite
rulesText: {2}: Add one mana of any color.
flavorText: Even its shadow is a dazzling rainbow.

name: Commence the Endgame
rulesText:
This spell can't be countered.
Draw two cards, then amass X, where X is the number of cards in your hand. (Put X +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. If you don't control one, create a 0/0 black Zombie Army creature token first.)
flavorText:
"Even gods shall kneel."
—Nicol Bolas

name: Sorin, Imperious Bloodlord
rulesText:
+1: Target creature you control gains deathtouch and lifelink until end of turn. If it's a Vampire, put a +1/+1 counter on it.
+1: You may sacrifice a Vampire. When you do, Sorin, Imperious Bloodlord deals 3 damage to any target and you gain 3 life.
−3: You may put a Vampire creature card from your hand onto the battlefield.

name: Sorin's Thirst
rulesText: Sorin's Thirst deals 2 damage to target creature and you gain 2 life.
flavorText: "All your steel won't protect you if your will is weak."

name: Triumphant Surge
rulesText: Destroy target creature with power 4 or greater. You gain 3 life.
flavorText: Not even death can quench a hero's inner fire.

name: Humble Naturalist
rulesText: {T}: Add one mana of any color. Spend this mana only to cast a creature spell.
flavorText: "The key to bonding with monsters, no matter their size, is knowing where they like to be scratched."

name: Survivors' Bond
rulesText:
Choose one or both —
• Return target Human creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
• Return target non-Human creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavorText: "And what did we learn? Never taunt a porcuparrot!"

name: Elspeth's Nightmare
rulesText:
(As this Saga enters and after your draw step, add a lore counter. Sacrifice after III.)
I — Destroy target creature an opponent controls with power 2 or less.
II — Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a noncreature, nonland card from it. That player discards that card.
III — Exile target opponent's graveyard.

name: Jace's Projection
rulesText:
Whenever you draw a card, put a +1/+1 counter on Jace's Projection.
{3}{U}: Put a loyalty counter on target Jace planeswalker.
flavorText: "Pardon me if I seem distracted. Part of me is reconnoitering the Tenth District."

name: Voracious Hydra
rulesText:
Trample
Voracious Hydra enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it.
When Voracious Hydra enters the battlefield, choose one —
• Double the number of +1/+1 counters on Voracious Hydra.
• Voracious Hydra fights target creature you don't control.

name: Ashiok's Skulker
rulesText: {3}{U}: Ashiok's Skulker can't be blocked this turn.
flavorText:
"Fear writhes and whispers in the shadows of your mind. It is the enemy you always knew would come."
—Ashiok

name: Omnath, Locus of the Roil
rulesText:
When Omnath, Locus of the Roil enters the battlefield, it deals damage to any target equal to the number of Elementals you control.
Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, put a +1/+1 counter on target Elemental you control. If you control eight or more lands, draw a card.

name: Stinging Lionfish
rulesText: Whenever you cast your first spell during each opponent's turn, you may tap or untap target nonland permanent.
flavorText: Starfish are its favorite prey.
